description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission LBI  ref: P052245 dated 06/07/2007.  The amendments are summarised below: 

i) Reconfigured residential layout to create one additional bathroom for one maisonette ii) Reconfiguration of the ground floor of Block A: removal of courtyard space:revised location for serviced apartment reception to area formerly noted as Almeida Theatre rehearsal/B1 space; relocated stair and lift core; amended residential reception design; extended floorspace for one residential unit. iii) First floor level; Amended office layout incorporating additional internal corridors; two B1 units at the southern end of the courtyard to be amended to 2x 1bed flats; revised serviced apartments layout leading to additional 6 units within approved footprint; lift and stair core alterations; angled rather than squared corners of courtyard space. iv) second to fourth floors; amended serviced apartment layouts creating 6 additional units per floor (within approved footprint) lift and stair core alterations ; angled rather than squared corners of courtyard space; two 2xbed units converted to 1 larger 3 bed unit v) Fifth floor; minor internal layout changes vi) amended stair cores to roof area vii) Amended internal courtyard elevations to reflect internal alterations
